Makes Voltron extremely mobile.|n|n|r|cffffd700Description:|n|r|cfff0e68cVoltron, the Legendary Titan of Lightning, is rather weak titan, but if he manages to power-up quickly he soon becomes unstoppable. Voltron's power undeniably lies in the late game - once he gets his Ultimate he becomes practically unstoppable. His shortened, twenty second wind walk restricts his early siege power, meanwhile his scouting ability is a harsh counter against invisibility.|r
